attributes.action: Disallow Lisburn from claiming areas of Belfast in the redrawing of Northern Irish constituency boundaries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lisburn's recent city status has resulted in its attempting to swallow areas of urban conurbation, which more naturally belong to the urban sprawl of nearby Belfast. This is harmful to the future growth of Belfast city.

All in favour of Belfast remaining Belfast and Lisburn creating its own unrban sprawl sign here.
